message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product. Given its value and quality, it's worth $8,000 to both of us. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
